perturbation.original_text: THIS AGREEMENT is entered into by and among ASHWORTH, INC. (The "Company" or "Ashworth"), JAMES W. NANTZ III ("Nantz") and NANTZ COMMUNICATIONS, INC. ("Nantz Communications"), effective as of June 1, 1998.
perturbation.changed_text: THIS AGREEMENT is entered into by and among ASHWORTH, INC. (The "Corporation" or "Ashworth"), JAMES W. NANTZ III ("Nantz") and NANTZ COMMUNICATIONS, INC. ("Nantz Communications"), effective as of June 1, 1998.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Company' is replaced with 'Corporation' without updating it consistently throughout the document. While arguably interchangeable, this can introduce ambiguity if the intent was for a specific legal definition of 'Company' to apply.

perturbation.original_text: Nantz will assist Ashworth in creating, promoting and participating in an event (i.e., golf tournament, cocktail reception, etc.)                                 ----                                                  to be associated with a major sporting event (i.e., PGA Championship,                                                    ----                         Masters, etc.).
perturbation.changed_text: Nantz will assist Ashworth in creating, promoting and participating in an activity (i.e., golf tournament, cocktail reception, etc.)                                 ----                                                  to be associated with a major sporting event (i.e., PGA Championship,                                                    ----                         Masters, etc.).
perturbation.explanation: The term 'event' is replaced with 'activity'. This is an internal contradiction because it creates uncertainty whether 'event' and 'activity' are the same or separate obligations.

perturbation.original_text: During the Term, neither Nantz Communications nor Nantz shall enter into any activity, employment, independent contract, or other business arrangement which conflicts with Nantz Communications' or Nantz's obligations under this Agreement or perform any service which reasonably appears to be an endorsement of the sportswear apparel, hats and shoes of a third party without the Company's prior written approval.  Nantz Communications and Nantz expressly agree that the Endorsement will not be granted to anyone other than the Company for use during the Term in connection with the advertisement and promotion of sportswear apparel, hats and shoes.
perturbation.changed_text: During the Term, neither Nantz Communications nor Nantz shall enter into any occupation, employment, independent contract, or other business arrangement which conflicts with Nantz Communications' or Nantz's obligations under this Agreement or perform any service which reasonably appears to be an endorsement of the sportswear apparel, hats and shoes of a third party without the Company's prior written approval.  Nantz Communications and Nantz expressly agree that the Endorsement will not be granted to anyone other than the Company for use during the Term in connection with the advertisement and promotion of sportswear apparel, hats and shoes.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'activity' is replaced with 'occupation'. This is an internal contradiction because it creates uncertainty whether 'activity' and 'occupation' are the same or separate obligations.
